_comment: Feature documentation catalog for chalo-app-kmp. Maps features to analytics flows and tracks documentation status.

mticket.name: M-Ticket
mticket.description: Mobile ticket booking for city buses - ticket selection, fare details, payment, activation, QR display.

instant-ticket.name: Instant Ticket
instant-ticket.description: Quick ticket buying flow with fare details and summary. Streamlined single-ride purchase.

super-pass.name: Super Pass
super-pass.description: Monthly/weekly bus passes - pass selection, passenger details, proof submission, verification, activation.

premium-bus-booking.name: Premium Bus — Booking
premium-bus-booking.description: Premium bus booking - trip details, pickup/drop, slot selection, seat selection, checkout, confirmation.

premium-bus-activation-tracking.name: Premium Bus — Activation & Tracking
premium-bus-activation-tracking.description: Post-booking premium bus - activation screen, live tracking, cancellation, receipts, acknowledgment cards.

premium-bus-bulk-booking.name: Premium Bus — Bulk Booking
premium-bus-bulk-booking.description: Premium bus multi-ride booking - eligibility, stop/slot selection, seat selection for multiple trips, rebooking.

metro.name: Metro
metro.description: Metro tickets - route discovery, fare fetching, booking, payment, validation, receipts. Includes ONDC metro.

ondc-bus.name: ONDC Bus
ondc-bus.description: ONDC bus tickets - booking, payment, validation via ONDC protocol. Separate from M-Ticket.

trip-planner.name: Trip Planner
trip-planner.description: Trip planning - location/stop-based entry, from/to selection, itineraries, quick filters, route details.

bills.name: Bills
bills.description: Bill payments - electricity bills, BEST bills, and other utility payments through the app.

card.name: Card
card.description: Physical card operations - Chalo Card linking/recharge, NCMC balance/recharge, card transactions, OCR scanning.

chalo-wallet.name: Chalo Wallet & Quick Pay
chalo-wallet.description: Wallet operations - balance, load money, transactions, KYC, migration. Plus Quick Pay wallet payments.

payment.name: Payment
payment.description: Payment processing - checkout screens, UPI, cards, net banking, Razorpay, Juspay, Inai, success/failure.

validation.name: Validation
validation.description: Ticket/pass validation - BLE scanning, QR codes, tap-in/out, conductor validation, punch notifications.

history.name: History
history.description: Booking and transaction history - past bookings, receipts, ride feedback, cancellation. Ticket summary.

home.name: Home
home.description: Home screen - tabs, navigation drawer, nearby stops, home cards, city change. Main app screen.

search.name: Search
search.description: Route and stop search - universal search/picker, route search results, stop selection.

live-tracking.name: Live Tracking
live-tracking.description: Route details and live tracking - ETA, schedules, live bus positions, favorites, seat availability.

authentication.name: Authentication
authentication.description: User authentication - login screen, OTP verification, Truecaller, logout, session management.

onboarding.name: Onboarding
onboarding.description: First-time user setup - language selection, city selection, tutorials, location permissions.

lifecycle.name: App Lifecycle
lifecycle.description: App-level events - launch, splash, force updates, ratings, sharing, terms acceptance.

help.name: Help
help.description: Help and support - help screens, issue reporting, chat support.

notifications.name: Notifications
notifications.description: Push notifications, in-app notifications, FCM, permission management, Plotline, Airship.

network.name: Network
network.description: Network and connectivity - connection state, socket management, SSL, encryption.

ads.name: Ads
ads.description: In-app advertising - native ads, banner ads, impressions, clicks, revenue tracking.

profile.name: Profile
profile.description: User profile management - view profile, edit profile, account settings.

sos.name: SOS
sos.description: Emergency SOS feature - emergency contacts, safety alerts.

report-problem.name: Report Problem
report-problem.description: In-app issue reporting - report bugs, feedback submission.

tito.name: Tap-In / Tap-Out (TITO)
tito.description: Tap-in/tap-out ride tracking - ride details, fare calculation, ride receipts.

product-activation.name: Product Activation
product-activation.description: Generic product activation flow - ticket/pass activation after purchase.

webview.name: WebView
webview.description: In-app web content - external URLs, payment webviews, terms pages.

project-structure.name: Project Structure
project-structure.description: Module tree, Gradle structure, KMP targets (Android/iOS), feature modules

tech-stack.name: Tech Stack
tech-stack.description: Kotlin, Ktor, Koin, SQLDelight, Compose Multiplatform, dependencies

architecture.name: Architecture
architecture.description: Clean Architecture layers, data flow, DI setup, Decompose navigation

navigation-guide.name: Navigation Guide
navigation-guide.description: How to find: screens → features → use cases → repos. ChaloScenes enum.

build-setup.name: Build Setup
build-setup.description: Prerequisites, IDE setup, running on Android/iOS emulators

conventions.name: Conventions
conventions.description: Naming (UseCase suffix, Repository suffix), package structure, MVI patterns

ios-specifics.name: iOS Specifics
ios-specifics.description: iOS-specific patterns, SwiftUI, SKIE annotations, platform-specific behavior

shared-infra.name: Shared Infrastructure
shared-infra.description: Networking, error handling, logging, analytics SDK, BLE, security
